mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Report to the Court: The Individuals Who Moved from Pennhurst

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A report from the Office of the Special Master regarding individuals who moved from Pennhurst to other institutions or community placements between March 17, 1978, and November 30, 1980.
